description:
Summer vacation is almost over. Ringo and the girls are discussing the homework that Mr. Atsui issued. They were told to create "hot and intense memories." As the three princesses discuss what to do to achieve this, a classmate shows up. She`s a fashionable girl named Momoka Hoshino.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Off We Go! Summer Memories Pri!
夏の思い出とんじゃビー! ☆ぷりっ!
